subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Steve Williamson, a Tampa Bay Lightning fan, began a journey last month that will take him to a game at each of the league’s 30 arenas in 30 consecutive days.
snippet: Steve Williamson, a Tampa Bay Lightning fan, began a journey last month that will take him to a game at each of the league’s 30 arenas in 30 consecutive days.
